title.narrative: Department of Energy, Office of Nuclear Incident Policy and Cooperation, International Radiological/Nuclear Emergency Preparedness and Response Engagement Activities

description.narrative: The U.S. Department of Energy's Office of Nuclear Incident Policy and Cooperation works with international partners to strengthen capabilities to develop emergency preparedness and response (EPR) techniques by providing the expertise and tools needed to respond to radiological events.
